subject: Swimming
Gold
lead_paragraph: The swimmer Brendan Hansen lost his gold medal from the Beijing Games during a flight to Texas from Philadelphia, but got it back a day later. “For about 18 hours, I was sweating bricks,” Hanson, a breaststroke specialist, said Tuesday. “What a roller coaster of emotions the last few days have been.”.
